title: New Liquid Chromatography Columns and Accessories: What to Know for 2023 - LCGC Chromatography Online
summary: The article reviews new liquid chromatography (LC) columns and accessories released between Pittcon 2022 and the 2023 conference in Philadelphia, covering various new product lines and extensions, including chiral columns, size-exclusion chromatography (SEC) columns, and nontraditional column formats.
green_innovation: FALSE. The article discusses new liquid chromatography columns and accessories, which do not focus on environmentally sustainable innovations or explicitly meet green innovation criteria.
business_innovation: TRUE. The focus is on the introduction of new liquid chromatography columns and accessories, representing business innovation through the development of new products in the market.
green_product: FALSE. The article is centered around liquid chromatography columns and accessories, which do not distinctly align with the criteria of green products designed to reduce environmental impact throughout their life cycle.
green_process: FALSE. The article primarily discusses new liquid chromatography columns and accessories, rather than highlighting methods or techniques in manufacturing that minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability.

greenwashing: FALSE. The article seems to focus on objectively presenting new liquid chromatography columns and accessories without making false or exaggerated environmental claims.
